oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pickard Family Performance Dec. 8 6:45 & Dec. 7 9:00
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 3 of 7. Two recordings of the Pickard Family (performance group) from December 8, 1937 at 6:45 and December 7, 1937 at 9:00 respectively. Sessions are recorded in Mexico.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pickard Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) All Aboard for Tennessee (Pickard Family) [Featuring Guitar & Harmonica Duet] -- (00:00) (00:31) Obed Pickard, Charlie Pickard, and Ruthie Pickard joke around about the Roosevelt Family and advertising in the White House -- (02:05) When My Dreamboat Comes Home (Pickard Family) [Charlie and Ruthie Duet] -- (03:55) Bub and Charlie poke fun at Ruthie's smile and bring up how to get a picture -- (04:40) Peruna commercial break performed by Obed Pickard -- (06:20) I love You Truly (Pickard Family) -- (06:56) The Pickards joke about their father's beauty -- (07:31) Wonder Valley (Pickard Family) -- (09:36) Obed and Charlie reflect on "Wonder Valley" and Bub tells of the Peruna holiday gift offer -- (11:32) Rest You the Perishing (Pickard Family) -- (12:10) Bub outro statement including Peruna gift give away -- (12:46) Obed says goodbye to the audience -- (13:08) Sally Goodin (Pickard Family) -- (14:12) Obed, Ruthie and Charlie joke about their father's fiddle playing -- (15:21) A Bed of Roses (Ruthie Pickard) -- (17:53) Ruthie and Charlie joke about proposals (18:20) Peruna commercial break performed by Bub -- (19:42) Way Down Upon The Sewanee River (Pickard Family) [Featuring Charlie on the jug] -- (20:14) Charlie and Obed joke about the jug (20:58) Sweet Fern (Pickard Family) -- (22:50) Obed reflects on the song and Bub tells of the Peruna holiday gift offer -- (24:52) Love Lifted Me (Pickard Family) -- (26:00) Closing voice over from Bub including: the Peruna gift offer, Obed saying goodbye, and an unknown voice)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Pickard Family (Musical Group);
